title: (x) Looking for dingbat font to recreate heraldic signs - various {Dav}
content:
Hi typophiles,

i hope someone can point me in the direction of a dingbat font that contains popular elements of heraldic signs/family crests, which would allow me to recreate a simplyfied version of an existing heraldic sign in Illustrator.

Thanks in advance,

Sebastian

 [‹ (x) Workforce Safety - ITC Quorum {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/typophile.com/node/13392 "Go to previous forum topic") [smirnoff ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/typophile.com/node/13368 "Go to next forum topic")
author: all about seb

comments.content:
_Not an actual dingbat font, but a ’trendy’ new collection of heraldic elements_.: ’ [Legion 01](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0043)’, ’ [Legion 02](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0044)’, ’ [Legion 03](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0045)’, ’ [Legion 04](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0082)’, ’ [Legion 05](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0083)’ + ’ [Legion 06](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0088)’ _( Stock Art )_, _by Joshua Smith / Hydro74, available from YouWorkForThem_..

_Or_ ’ [Shields](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/altemus/shields/)’, _by Robert Altemus, or_, ’ [Wappenbee](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kennmunk/wappenbee/)’, _by fellow Typophile Kenn Munk, maybe_.? :)  
_( And theres even ’ [Heraldry Clipart](http://web.archive.org/web/20070709010141/http:/www.heraldryclipart.com/)’.. :)_

Dav,

thanks for the links to the various cliparts - i haven t really found what i was looking for, but some of the Legion cliparts should be a good starting point.

Seb
